data.name: Fire King Avatar Kirin
data.desc: If a face-up "Fire King" monster you control is destroyed by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can send 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to the Graveyard.

card_sets.set_name: Onslaught of the Fire Kings Structure Deck
